text: The 1978 Bexley Council election took place on 4 May 1978 to elect members of Bexley London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Conservative party stayed in overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1978 Category:1978 London Borough council elections
title: 1978 Bexley London Borough Council election
